WorkItem.Description:
What’s the right way to programmatically invoke verbs registered in the OpenWithProgIds section of the registry (i.e. emulating clicking “Microsoft Visual Studio 2010” as shown here) ? I can find the appropriate names (e.g. “VisualStudio.xml.11.0”) but I don’t see what API actually consumes those names.
 
 http://blogs.msdn.com/10033224.aspx
It uses the ability to create items as a particular type, specifying the ProgID using STR_PARSE_WITH_EXPLICIT_PROGID.
WorkItem.Summary: Open As a specific file type
